summary.span: 指定从域名服务器中请求信息的权限。

span.span: Specifies permission to request information from Domain Name Servers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明的安全信息 存储在属性目标的元数据中，后者是应用的类 。The security information declared by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which the is applied. 然后，系统会在运行时访问此信息。The system then accesses this information at run time. 传递给构造函数的将确定允许的 DNS 目标。The that is passed to the constructor determines the allowable DNS targets. 这些安全特性仅用于 [声明性安全](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。These security attributes are used only for [Declarative Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 对于 [命令性安全](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，请使用相应的 类。For [Imperative Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding class. 安全访问被完全限制或完全不受限制。Security access is either fully restricted or fully unrestricted. 将 属性设置为可 `true` 授予访问权限，或者 `false` 不允许访问。Set the property to `true` to grant access, or `false` for no access. 将此属性设置为命名参数。Set this property as a named parameter. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例使用将 声明性安全应用于自定义类。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. [!code-cpp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic DnsPermissionAttributeExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给此构造函数的值指定允许的 目标。The value that is passed to this constructor specifies the allowable targets. ## Examples 下面的示例使用将 声明性安全应用于自定义类。The following example uses to apply declarative security to a custom class. summary.span: 创建并返回 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.

returns.span: 与安全性声明相对应的 。

span.span: A that corresponds to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 `CreatePermission` 方法由安全系统调用，而不是由应用程序代码调用。The `CreatePermission` method is called by the security system, not by application code. 描述的安全信息 存储在属性目标的元数据中，后者是应用到的类 。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 然后，系统将在运行时访问该信息并调用 。The system then accesses the information at run time and calls . 系统使用返回的 来强制实施指定的安全要求。The system uses the returned to enforce the specified security requirements.
